title: Wasting Away
description: Along the lonely wasteland, he wanders. Fragments of yesterday, worn and withered, pull at his senses. Through it all, he has never lost hope. He will fight the dead with everything he has. He can't let them win. Failure is not an option.The Dead took away everything he loved.They left him to rot in an unforgiving world.... just another shambling body.... just like one of their own.The world is falling apart around him.... everything is Wasting Away.
author: Richard M. Cochran
